original_text: The woman was very beautiful; she took care of the king and waited on him, but the king had no sexual relations with her.
korean_text: 이 처녀는 심히 아름다워 그가 왕을 받들어 시중들었으나 왕이 잠자리는 같이 하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: she took care of the king
but the king had no sexual relations with her
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 왕은 그녀와 성관계를 갖지 않았다
